#summary A list and description of other schema used in these projects

= Introduction =



= Details =

The following 3 schema (group, project and dataset) are near-identical, and have thus been (nearly) incorporated.

{{{
<group|project|dataset>
    <institution />
    <department />
    <key />
    <alternativeName />
    <abbreviatedName />
    <primaryName />
    <url />
    <email />
    <fax />
    <phone />
    <otherElectronic type="" />
    <startDate />
    <endDate />
    <postalAddress>
        <country />
        <postcode />
        <state />
        <text />
    </postalAddress>
    <streetAddress>
        <country />
        <postcode />
        <state />
        <text />
    </streetAddress>
    <hasMember />
    <subject type="" />
    <briefDescription />
    <fullDescription />
    <relatedWebsite>
        <location />
        <title />
        <notes />
    </relatedWebsite>
    <relatedPublication>
        <location />
        <title />
        <notes />
    </relatedPublication>
</group|project|dataset>
}}}
